title: Bronze sq shield

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Bronze sq shield is the lowest level defence square shield in Gielinor. It can be equipped to give a player better defence bonuses in combat. Its recommended use is in melee combat. Players can make a bronze square shield with 2 bronze bars at level 8 Smithing, granting 25 Smithing experience. It can also be bought from Cassie's Shield Shop in Falador.

Item ID1173

The Bronze sq shield is the lowest level defence square shield in Gielinor. It can be equipped to give a player better defence bonuses in combat. Its recommended use is in melee combat. Players can make a bronze square shield with 2 bronze bars at level 8 Smithing, granting 25 Smithing experience. It can also be bought from Cassie's Shield Shop in Falador.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6+0
 Defence bonuses
+5+6+4+0+5
